TopicTitle: Twitch Stream: KSP Career Mode - Ozzy's Space Program!

Articles.Content:
Hi Everyone!

I am new to the forums (can you believe this name wasn't taken?! lol), and pretty new to streaming. I wanted to let folks know about my stream OzzyInSpace. I'll be streaming most of today, and usually try to stream Ozzy's Space Program M-F 6pm CST, and as often as I can on the weekends. I have today off of work, and will be on sooner. 

Feel free to check it out! [http://www.twitch.tv/ozzyinspace](http://www.twitch.tv/ozzyinspace)

Thanks!

OzzyInSpace ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
